Introduction

Boy Story is a Chinese boy group launched by JYP Entertainment and Tencent Music Entertainment Group (TME) under the JYPE vision of “K-pop 3.0” or “Globalization by Localization”.

The group’s six members were selected by JYPE founder Park Jin-young as early as 2016 and have trained under the company ever since. Since September 2017, the “Real Project” pre-debut series was launched with four singles in order to make way for the group’s official debut on September 21, 2018.
